title: #AppleEvent hashflag now displays animation when you like a tweet
content:
As we’re a few hours away from the first Apple event of the year, the company has just updated its Twitter hashflag to display an animation when you like a tweet.

more…

The post #AppleEvent hashflag now displays animation when you like a tweet appeared first on 9to5Mac.
